description: Episode number 1 of Series "The Worlds of childhood". Exploration of the historical, cultural, and individual diversity of childhood: what development is, how it occurs and the significance of the the prolonged period of human infancy and childhood. A visual tour of development includes children in Russia, Japan, Brazil, Cameroon and New York.
